input: The bear eats the rabbit. The bear is cold. The bear is young. The bear needs the rabbit. The bear needs the tiger. The dog chases the bear. The dog chases the rabbit. The dog is big. The dog needs the tiger. The rabbit is young. The rabbit needs the dog. The tiger chases the dog. If the bear is big then the bear needs the tiger. If something needs the tiger then it chases the tiger. If something chases the tiger and it needs the dog then the dog is blue. If something chases the bear then it eats the dog. If something chases the dog and the dog is big then the dog is young. If something is young then it chases the bear. If something chases the rabbit and the rabbit eats the dog then the dog is round. If something eats the dog and it is round then it is big. If something is round and it needs the tiger then the tiger is young. Question: The tiger chases the bear.?
output:
universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Bear : obj
constant Rabbit : obj
constant Tiger : obj
constant Dog : obj

constant Eats : obj → obj → Prop
constant Cold : obj → Prop
constant Young : obj → Prop
constant Needs : obj → obj → Prop
constant Chases : obj → obj → Prop
constant Big : obj → Prop
constant Blue : obj → Prop
constant Round : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : Eats Bear Rabbit
axiom T2 : Cold Bear
axiom T3 : Young Bear
axiom T4 : Needs Bear Rabbit
axiom T5 : Needs Bear Tiger
axiom T6 : Chases Dog Bear
axiom T7 : Chases Dog Rabbit
axiom T8 : Big Dog
axiom T9 : Needs Dog Tiger
axiom T10 : Young Rabbit
axiom T11 : Needs Rabbit Dog
axiom T12 : Chases Tiger Dog

axiom R1 : Big Bear → Needs Bear Tiger
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, Needs x Tiger → Chases x Tiger
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Chases x Tiger ∧ Needs x Dog → Blue Dog
axiom R4 : ∀ x : obj, Chases x Bear → Eats x Dog
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Chases x Dog ∧ Big Dog → Young Dog
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, Young x → Chases x Bear
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Chases x Rabbit ∧ Eats Rabbit Dog → Round Dog
axiom R8 : ∀ x : obj, Eats x Dog ∧ Round x → Big x
axiom R9 : ∀ x : obj, Round x ∧ Needs x Tiger → Young Tiger

theorem tiger_chases_bear : Chases Tiger Bear :=
begin
  apply R6,
  apply R9 Tiger,
  split,
  apply R8 Dog,
  split,
  apply R4,
  exact T6,
  apply R7 Dog,
  split,
  exact T7,
  apply R4,
  exact T6,
  exact T9,
end

-- The answer is True
